entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
